results.content: Die meisten clips sind etwas mehr als 1 minute lang, was sehr anstrengend ist, da hätte man locker 3 bis 4 clips zusammen nehmen können zumal es eh ums gleiche ging.

results.content: It´s a 5 stars course. It´s easy, clear, graphic, and has a proper speed for me. The content is useful and relevant.  But there is only one aspect I should chance.  I had to add many notes in order to make an index by myself. There is no detailed index to help users to consult later, when they will actually do the template. But, I  highly recommend this course. I already knew to use Template Creator CK. The first lessons cover topics that I knew. Even so, I learn interesting details. From the middle forward, I took many notes. Great for beginners and great for not so beginers.

Fast perfekt, aber nicht für die neueste Version - trotzdem sehr gut verständlich und sehr hilfreich. Angenehme Stimme des Lehrers. Sehr gute Geschwindigkeit des Unterrichts.
Nearly perfect but not for the newest version - easy to understand and very helpful. Pleasent voice of the teacher. Very good teaching speed.

results.content: Corso ben fatto. Buon inglese. La parte piu' interessante è quella sui css e template overrides. In attesa del corso di approfondimento jquery ecc..well done!

response.content: I'm glad you enjoyed the course. Thank you very much :)

results.content: A excellent resource to a quickstart guide on using Template Creator CK that actually fills in 'missing bits' in the documentation provided with the software for those new to using template / page building like Joomla extensions.  A time saver for those not keen on playing around with the software interface to correctly work out where apply CSS rules to tailor a template design.  Only negative of the course is the chunking of each section  into multiple videos (actually extends the course watching time 'uselessly' in my opinion), but if one can put up with that the guidance is sound for a basic to intermediate course on what is a very good and flexible software.
results.content_html: A excellent resource to a quickstart guide on using Template Creator CK that actually fills in 'missing bits' in the documentation provided with the software for those new to using template / page building like Joomla extensions. A time saver for those not keen on playing around with the software interface to correctly work out where apply CSS rules to tailor a template design. Only negative of the course is the chunking of each section into multiple videos (actually extends the course watching time 'uselessly' in my opinion), but if one can put up with that the guidance is sound for a basic to intermediate course on what is a very good and flexible software.

The rest of the course was terrific.

results.content: Well done course, broken down into bite-sized pieces and clearly explained step-by-step. After suffering the horrors of Artisteer 4.3 (which only works in windows computers - I'm a mac guy), Template Creator CK is a dream come true.  This course made what would be otherwise a very steep learning curve, to be very manageable. Thanks Andries!

response.content:
You are more than welcome. I also worked with artisteer for a while, but template creator is truly in a different league. Good luck with your future endeavours 

Regards
Andries

results.content:
Unfortunately, I purchased this course a few years ago but never used it.  I just purchased Template Creator today (1/2019) and it is a bit different so the videos so far have not corresponded to the current version of TC.

As I'm going through the course now, I'm finding that the instructor is not engaging....speaking tone is very dull.  His videos are cut so short and go to the next one very quickly. He needs to keep his videos with similar components together so that users can stop, do the task, and continue, instead of having to wade through 10-16 different videos, with no idea of the specifics in that video.  He instructs you to do something, then ends the video before you can make sure you have correctly completed the task.  

Although I'm enjoying the software, this instructor really needs to improve on his presentation AND his video quality.
results.content_html:

results.content: So much for so little. This course gives so much information that makes it worth every cent. I have used many different tools to create templates and this is by far the best tool for the job. It makes creating joomla templates a breeze. Thanks for an awesome course Mr Bester.
